ministry.name: Men's Accountability Groups
ministry.overview: The men's accountability groups meet to provide men a place to form relationships while being discipled through teaching, accountability and prayer.

long-description.heading: North
long-description.p: The men's accountability group meets 6:15am every Monday morning at the Cedar Perk Coffee and Cream Shop located at 200 Buttercup Creek Blvd. Ste. 123, Cedar Park, Tx 78613-3732 (Phone: (512) 257-7088). Further info is forthcoming
